attributes.action: Make it compulsory that all private cars in the UK carry a proper Spare wheel
attributes.additional_details:
Please amend the appropriate regulations,  Is it Construction and Use  of  motor vehicles Act?

Please  make it compulsory that new private cars   sold in the UK   MUST   be supplied and fitted with a full size  spare wheel  fitted with  the identical tyres  as fitted as the road wheels of the vehicle.

Many  owners and drivers fail to realise that there is no spare wheel with the car until they  have an unexpected flat tyre.

Drivers do not want to be left stranded  on the hard shoulder  at 3 am and do not want to wait for two hours until help arrives.
